title: Wendy Williams dresses down as she returns to work in New York after Hollywood Walk of Fame star
text:
She received a coveted Hollywood Walk of Fame star in Los Angeles on Thursday.

But it was back to work for Wendy Williams as she stepped out in New York City for her talk show on Monday morning.

The 55-year-old host dressed down in black leggings and a coat as she headed to the studio to film another episode of her long-running program.

Out and about: It was back to work for Wendy Williams as she stepped out in New York City for her talk show on Monday morning

Wendy enlisted the help of a security guard to carry her belongings to a waiting town car before being whisked away.

She covered up in a long, forest green coat with a host of colorful patches on her shoulders and chest.

One patch was sewn above a winking smiley face with black and white crossed out followed by human with an exclamation mark.

Casual: The 55-year-old host dressed down in black leggings and a coat as she headed to the studio to film another episode of her long-running program

She teamed a pair of tight black leggings with black-and-white high-top trainers while making her way through city streets.

Williams flashed a few diamond bracelets and a matching watch while carrying her alligator leather purse close to her chest.

Her bright blonde hair was loosely curled and she wore a pair of over-sized sunglasses over her eyes.

Festive: She covered up in a long, forest green coat with a host of colorful patches on her shoulders and chest

A message: One patch was sewn above a winking smiley face with black and white crossed out followed by human with an exclamation mark

Williams was appropriately decked out in a sheer Dolce & Gabbana dress covered in stars for her ceremony in Hollywood last week.

During the ceremony, she addressed recent events in her life, and did not hide her emotions.

'The elephant in the room is that I've been having a very, very tough year but, slowly but surely, I'm climbing out of the pit and this is one of those monumental days that makes me say, you know, if you don't believe in yourself who will believe in you?' she said during her speech.

In April, Wendy filed for divorce from her husband of 21 years, Kevin Hunter, amid allegations that he had had a child out of wedlock with another woman.

However, Wendy had already known for quite some time about the illicit affair and love child, yet she waited to act on ending the marriage because her own son, Kevin Jr., was still living at home.
